refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: These configuration files control global network parameters. For e.g. DHCP Unique Identifier (DUID).

refsect1.title: [DUID] Section Options
refsect1.para: This section configures the DHCP Unique Idendifier (DUID) value used by DHCP protocol. DHCPv6 client protocol sends the DHCP Unique Identifier and the interface Identity Association Identifier (IAID) to a DHCP server when acquiring a dynamic IPv6 address. DHCPv4 client protocol sends IAID and DUID to the DHCP server when acquiring a dynamic IPv4 address if ClientIdentifier=duid. IAID and DUID allows a DHCP server to uniquely identify the machine and the interface requesting a DHCP IP. To configure IAID and ClientIdentifier, see systemd.network 5.
The DUID value specified here overrides the DUID that systemd-networkd generates using the machine-id from the /etc/machine-id file. To configure DUID per-network, see systemd.network 5.
The configured DHCP DUID should conform to the specification in RFC 3315, RFC 6355. To configure IAID, see systemd.network5 .
The following options are available in [DUID] section:

listitem.para: The type of DUID specified in this section. The following values are supported:

raw : If Type=raw, then RawData= specifies the entire DUID. For e.g: RawData=00:02:00:00:ab:11:f9:2a:c2:77:29:f9:5c:00 specifies a 14 byte long DUID-EN ("00:02"), with enterprise number 43793 ("00:00:ab:11"), and identifier value "f9:2a:c2:77:29:f9:5c:00".
If Type is not specified and RawData is specified, Type defaults to 'raw'.
Type will support the following values in the future:
link-layer-and-time : If Type=link-layer-and-time, then MACAddress= and TimeStamp= specify the hardware address and time-stamp for DUID-LLT.
vendor : If Type=vendor, then EnterpriseNumber= and RawData= specify the enterprise number and identifier for DUID-EN.
link-layer : If Type=link-layer, then MACAddress= specifies the hardware address for DUID-LL.
uuid : If Type=uuid, then UUID= specifies DUID-UUID.
Specifies the DUID bytes as a single newline-terminated, hexadecimal string, with each byte separated by a ':'.

refsect1.para: The following options will be supported in the future:

listitem.para: Specifies the link-layer address for DUID Type link-layer or link-layer-and-time.
Specifies the DUID generation time for DUID Type link-layer-and-time.
Specifies the enterprise number for DUID Type vendor.
Specifies the UUID for DUID Type uuid.
